Class Shape.Color

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.media.graphic.shape.Shape.Color
Enclosing class:
Shape
public static final class Shape.Color
extends java.lang.Object
Defines the sRGB color of rendered shapes.
